artist: Artist: Ryūryūkyo Shinsai; Publisher: Maruya Bun'emon
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
short description of the wrestler and the kyo_ka poem admiring him by Dondontei Kazutaru(Sumo_ drummer)
description:
Despite his young age
He is great on ring
As tall as box seats
Raising a battle cry louder and loude
(Toshi wa dohyo_ no kazu futatsu ?? shite
Shi-hon mushiro no ????? yoku
Take wa sajiki no ue ni miagete
Hoyuru koe iyoiyo takashi
somo_ daiko no Dondontei Kazutaru san)

poem:illegible
markings:
Censor:kiwame
Publisher:Marubun
profile of the wrester written aroun his name
born in Fukaya on the Nakasendo_ road
14 years old
hight: 5 shaku 8 sun(about 175 cm)
weight:23 kanme(about 87 kg)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: The Sumō Wrestler Shirataki Saijirō
